name: AlooTechie
overview:
AlooTechie is India’s leading digital industry forum with readership of over 40,000 digital industry professionals daily. We have news, articles, interviews and thought leadership sections which cover the digital industry space in the country. We also offer JobXchange where users can find all the hottest jobs currently available in the industry. Our daily newsletter has a readership among our core target audience of brand marketers, digital agencies and publishers which has made us the go-to destination for professionals from brands, media and the new-age digital companies.

AlooTechieâ€™s mission is to help develop a vibrant interactive forum for the people who have direct or indirect stake in the Indian online industry – internet entrepreneurs, people working in internet companies, digital agencies, marketers interested in leveraging the digital media for promoting their brands, VCs looking for investment opportunities in online startups, students looking for career opportunities in the digital agencies, and online companies.

AlooTechie was founded by Rajesh Barnwal in 2005, and the editorial team is being led by Satrajit Sen. You can reach Satrajit by mailing him at editor@alootechie.com. To advertise and other business opportunities, please send an email: advertise@alootechie.com

offices.address1: 7, Keher Singh Estate, Westend Marg, Lane 2
